channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitron Technologies Inc. -- Hitron CODA-5310
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitron Technologies Inc. -- Hitron CODA-5310

item.title: CVE-2023-30603|2024-10-14T03:47:30.952Z -- hitron%20technologies%20inc. -- hitron%20coda-5310
item.description: Hitron Technologies CODA-5310 Telnet function with the default account and password, and there is no warning or prompt to ask users to change the default password and account. An unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to obtain the administrator’s privilege, resulting in performing arbitrary system operation or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2023-30602|2024-10-14T03:57:51.392Z -- hitron%20technologies%20inc. -- hitron%20coda-5310
item.description: Hitron Technologies CODA-5310’s Telnet function transfers sensitive data in plaintext. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to access credentials of normal users and administrator.
